title: 3 bots on my team
body:
I just lost a beginner bot game for no other reason than that there were 3 bots on my team. They walked down mid lane and inted as soon as the game started. They didnt buy items, didnt have runes, and fed the Annie bot. This shouldn't happen??? 
Please look at my match history

replies.body: Riot doesn't care because it's what's keeping players playing when they get banned.
